opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Rhodes for the Superior Court.

casebody.head_matter:
Simpson v. Montgomery Ward & Co., Appellant.
Argued September 25, 1950.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearns, Jones, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.

October 13, 1950:
